question:
Which among the following information about Lee commission are correct?
1. It was appointed in 1923
2. Lord Lee was the chairman of the commission
3. It recommended increasing the rate of Indians in Civil Service
4. It recommended to set up a Public Service Commission
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Lee commission was appointed in the year 1923. Lord Lee was the chairman of the commission. It submitted its report in the year 1924. It recommended to increase the rate of Indians in Civil Service and also recommended to set up a Public Service Commission.
